code: import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import{useLocation}from'react-router-dom';import parse from"html-react-parser";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";function NavItem(props){var location=useLocation().pathname;function rotateLogo(){var cube=document.querySelector(".cube");if(!cube.classList.contains("rotate")&&location!==props.route){cube.classList.add("rotate");setTimeout(function(){cube.classList.remove("rotate");},1000);}}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{className:"nav-item-link",to:props.route,onClick:rotateLogo,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:location!==props.route?"nav-item":"nav-item active",children:parse(props.text)})});}export default NavItem;
